Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are travelling on Eidenhoft Boulevard, just south of the Shrine.
Room.LongDescription: The Shrine of Protectors, located north of Eidenhoft Boulevard, is more of a monument to the gods. Fighters leaving for battle often leave a small sacrifice on the alters to appease the gods and to give them some added strength. The Shrine is not guided by a group of clerics or priests, but is upkept by those who pray and leave sacrifices there. The intersection of Oceancrest Drive and Nagaritha Drive is southwest of here.
